decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The caretakers house shall not be occupied until space has been laid out within the site in accordance with submitted drawing ref : HHC/CH/10 for 2 cars to be parked and for vehicles to turn so that they may enter and leave the site in forward gear. Such space shall thereafetr be retained

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800 to 1800 on Mondays to Friday and 0800 to 1300 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - No work shall begin on site until details of final finished floor levels have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall, thereafter, be carried out in acccordance with the approved details
description: Demolition of existing caretakers house and attached workshop and store and erection of single storey caretaker's house, new workshop, pool plant room and store to existing health club.
